title: Video Utilization Strategies for Blended Teacher Education: Applying the Laboratory Rotation Model

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in foundational digital education tools and experience in teaching social studies
context.additional_context: An intensive short-term course for practicing elementary school teachers to enhance video production and utilization skills for social studies, designed with a lab rotation model to iteratively experience theory-practice-reflection stages.

learning_goals: Learners can effectively utilize educational videos aligned with the three stages (theory-practice-reflection) of the laboratory cycle model
Learners produce at least one 5-minute educational video explaining key concepts in social studies
Learners provide at least three criteria for evaluating peersâ€™ videos and offering improvement feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
